description: Bring home this Bikaji Sadabahar soan papdi and kaju soan papdi combo. It is made of flaky sweet with pistachios and almonds. The kaju soan papdi is made of flakes of cashew and almonds. This pack will bring smile on your near and dear ones faces. Make a right choice by buying this attractive looking pack of delicious soan papdi and kaju soan papdi and get amazed in its awesome taste. This delicious pack of soan papdi and kaju soan papdi can even be used as a great option for gifting purposes on occasions like birthdays, anniversaries and on festivals that will make your loved ones extremely happy.
Soft cottage cheese dumplings in sugar syrup is made of tasty ingredients, great-tasting, high-quality Indian snack with uses of 100 percent natural ingredients in the preparation.
